author: VinInn
body:
A new Expression Evaluator based on the standard C++ compiler
to replace the current one that is implemented using on a home-made parser (based on boost::spirit) and access objects using ROOT-reflection

motivations, doc, examples in 
http://innocent.home.cern.ch/innocent/ExprEval.pdf
presented at reco/phys-tool meeting on 29/01

WasAutomatically ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #7480 as #7807 
resync and port to the HEAD
title: Expression Evaluator
